name: Crusader Party
description:
Crusader Party is an online multiplayer game of stealth and cunning, where a handful of human players find cover within a sea of identical-looking NPCs.  Do you bide your time, waiting for the perfect moment to strike?  Or do you slaughter everyone in your path, in order to transform into the monstrous Antler Knight?

Only one crusader can be victorious in this forsaken, medieval landscape.
